entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
